name: HC - A volta dos que nunca foram
name_original: HC - A volta dos que nunca foram
description:
Simple shooter game designed in class where the player explores an abandoned building infested with the undead. This game is just a prototype for programming study purposes.

Created by: Rodrigo Deporte Pereira

Commands:

  • WASD - Move the character;
  • Space - Jump;
  • Mouse - Move the camera;
  • Left Button - Shoot;
